nodes.text: Christopher West is an illustrator whose work has appeared in several different Star Wars books and magazines. He specializes in cartography, and has illustrated many starship deck plans and other maps for the Star Wars roleplaying game, Star Wars Gamer, and various other products. He wrote and illustrated a Polyhedron feature article that officially explored the history of the Millennium Falcon, and continues to illustrate poster maps for the Star Wars Miniatures Game.
